Oh, and by the way, the demo only includes 5 sections which you can go through as easily you take a leak. You can't even finish the quest you get in the beginning (unless I've missed something) 'cause you can't get to that station.

Am I the only one sick and tired of 1,5GB+ demos that don't give you shit regarding the feeling of the game? Can't be good for the gamecos either...

Crap graphics, dull combat, boring quests. So much potential in the idea but Flagship Studios dropped the ball. If you wanna play a shooter-style RPG try Tabula Rasa. It may be cheesy but at least its more polished and fun than this turd.
